title: Bugged runes
body: I can't change my runepage - I can rename it and put in new runes but when I try to pick it for a game it doesnt work - I end up with the other page (the page named "Singed")

replies.body:
I did a little digging in your account to find out what was up with those weird rune pages, and it looks like those 2 rune pages were being tied together for some strange reason. I made a little adjustment, and you may need to set up those pages again, but you should be able to pick either one now.

Hit me back up if you're still having some issues with those pages!
I'm actually having the same problem {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}} . Could you do something to my account or should I just email riot support?
Which ones were giving you troubles?
Runes Pages 2 and 3 refuse to save.
Looked into it, check those pages now. You might need to set them back up, but you should be able to freely edit them now!

Thanks so much for the help!!
 {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Currently having the exact same problem with my account, 2 of my pages are linked and it's resulting in me going into games with bugged pages or no runes, can you please look into this and hopefully fix it?

I'm having the same problem. I've submitted a couple of bug reports about it since my problem has changed. I can no longer even name my rune pages. And once I set and save (only one will save) the stats don't show up and it still shows as empty in the drop box.

I'm having an issue with duplicated / multiple runes for some reason.

If I try to add runes that I don't have 9x of for example (that I remember buying), even though it'll show 9x or sometimes 11x of a rune type, it won't save the runepage and give an error about server connection or something.

Also, is there a way to get rid of my tier 2 runes? I bought a lot since they were 1IP but now I don't need/want them anymore.
I'm having a similar issue. When I put runes into the page they will appear to go in, but will leave the same number of runes on the left and not let me save the page.
